Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: I skied from 10-11:30 today. A very icy wind blown skate deck but still fun. Classic tracks were mostly intact on cedar trace and coyote run, but wind had filled them in on hawks hills. I had a very nice ski.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: [ ] groomed[ ] golf course is about as good as it gets[ ] Sheldon trails - fair to  good littered with tree parts, though the usual being trod upon[ ] icy patches under trees where not enough snow made it to the groun)d as it got colder and the rain - wet snow turned to ( oops - repost -- rain >>> snow

nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails were power-tilled and tracked on Tuesday. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.comments: The exceptional early season conditions continue today. The temperature should stay just below freezing, making for a comfortable day on the slopes. The snow surface is machine groomed. Pintail Peak opens this Friday. The Big Park opens on Saturday. Lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
